alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 11:40AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Curry and west central Josephine Counties through 1215 PM PST... At 1139 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Pistol River, or 17 miles north of Brookings, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Curry and west central Josephine Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
